pages.text: Direwolves wander the cold landscapes of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Deinotherium alongside Horses and Cows. $(br2)Deinotherium can be tamed much like horses and can have saddles, chests, and even carpets.
When tamed, they can carry up to 2 players. $(br2)Deinotherium enjoy: $(br2)Raw Meat and Bones.
